packages.label: Seti River Rafting
packages.description: The Seti is an excellent 2-day trip in an isolated area with beautiful jungle, plenty of easy rapids, and serene views.

packages.label: Bhotekoshi River Rafting
packages.description: The Bhote Kosi / Upper Sun Kosi (during high water) is an action-packed white water experience, perfect for thrill-seekers.

packages.label: Trisuli River Rafting
packages.description: The Trisuli is Nepal’s most popular rafting river, offering impressive gorges, exciting rapids, and easy accessibility from Kathmandu.

packages.label: Marshyandi River Rafting
packages.description: The 'raging river' drains the northern slopes of the Annapurna mountains and offers thrilling rafting since its opening in 1996.

packages.label: Kaligandaki River Rafting
packages.description: The Kali begins its journey high on the Tibetan plateau in Mustang, plunging its way through narrow gorges and stunning landscapes.

packages.label: Arun River Rafting
packages.description: For first-time paddlers, the Arun River offers a thrilling rafting experience with class 3 to 4+ rapids and scenic surroundings.

packages.label: Sunkoshi River Rafting
packages.description: The 'River of Gold' is among the top ten river expeditions globally, a dream destination for rafting enthusiasts.

packages.label: Karnali River Rafting
packages.description: The Karnali, Nepal’s longest and largest river, originates at the base of Mt. Kailash and offers an incredible rafting adventure.
